body_html:
@on-the-run, can u verify the RoCE configuration with ib_write_bw between the 2 nodes ?
As @byronyi said, you may need to configure lossless (PFC) or ECN to prevent the packet loss.
ib_write_bw is a good stress test to see if RoCE is configured good.
Can u attach the full logs of the PS and worker ? I'm missing a lot of events here in the logs.

body:
@on-the-run, can u verify the RoCE configuration with ib_write_bw between the 2 nodes ?
As @byronyi said, you may need to configure lossless (PFC) or ECN to prevent the packet loss.
ib_write_bw is a good stress test to see if RoCE is configured good.
Can u attach the full logs of the PS and worker ? I'm missing a lot of events here in the logs.
